title: The Buffalo Soldiers: A Narrative of the Negro Cavalry in the West
description: Shipped from UK, please allow 10 to 21 business days for arrival. THE BUFFALO SOLDIERS - A NARATIVE OF THE NEGRO CAVALRY IN THE WEST, hardcover, Good, A very good, clean and sound copy in bright acid yellow cloth boards with blue label on spine, silver gilt lettering. Dust jacket is rubbed and worn at edges but otherwise clean, bright and unfaded. A nice copy.
author: William H. Leckie
